name: Ham Croquettes
author: BARNETTBUNCH
summary: A delicious croquette recipe, made with ham, onions, & cheese.  It is so good & tastes just like I remember my mom's!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package sliced honey ham, finely chopped
directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Stir in onion, green onions, and garlic; cook until tender, about 10 minutes
Transfer contents of skillet to a large bowl
Stir in ham, Cheddar cheese, and 1 1/2 cups of bread crumbs
Beat 3 eggs; stir into ham mixture
Using your hands, make golf ball-size balls out of the ham mixture
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Spread remaining bread crumbs onto a plate
In a large bowl, beat 1 egg; stir in water
Dip balls into egg mixture, and roll in bread crumbs
Place balls in hot oil being careful not to crowd
Remove to paper towels to soak up grease
